definitions.definition: A chief magistrate of ancient Athens.
A person who claims the right to rule, or to exercise power or sovereign authority over other human beings.
A ruler , head of state or other leader .
A supernatural being subordinate to the Demiurge .

main_definition: A chief magistrate of ancient Athens.
secondary_definitions: A person who claims the right to rule, or to exercise power or sovereign authority over other human beings.
A ruler , head of state or other leader .
( Gnosticism ) A supernatural being subordinate to the Demiurge .
